description.fr:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Confère {PropertyEffect:82} et {ATvalue:v,percent,+} aux {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other} alignés puis inflige son {%AT} aux adversaires alignés.
description.en:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Confers {PropertyEffect:82} and {ATvalue:v,percent,+} on in-line {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other} then inflicts {%AT} on in-line opponents.
description.es:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Confiere {PropertyEffect:82} y {ATvalue:v,percent,+} a los {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other} alineados e inflige su {%AT} a los adversarios alineados.
description.de:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Für {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other} in derselben Reihe gewährt er {PropertyEffect:82} sowie {ATvalue:v,percent,+} und fügt Gegnern in derselben Reihe dann seinen {%AT,plural:one} als Schaden zu.
description.pt:
<rem>{NamedEffect:865}</rem>
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Concede {PropertyEffect:82} e {ATvalue:v,percent,+} aos {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other} alinhados, depois inflige seu {%AT} aos adversários alinhados.
